## âœ… Checklist
<!-- Ensure all items are checked before submitting -->
### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the React best practices
- [ ] I have removed console.log statements and debugger
- [ ] I have removed commented-out code
- [ ] I have removed unused imports, states, and props
- [ ] I have used proper React hooks (no hooks inside conditions/loops)
- [ ] I have avoided prop drilling where appropriate
- [ ] Components are properly named in PascalCase
- [ ] Custom hooks start with "use" prefix

### Functionality
- [ ] My code works without errors
- [ ] No console warnings in browser
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] I have added tests for new functionality (if applicable)
- [ ] Redux state updates correctly (if applicable)
- [ ] Local storage operations work correctly (if applicable)

### UI/UX
- [ ] UI is responsive on all screen sizes
- [ ] Styling is consistent with existing design
- [ ] Tailwind classes are used properly (if applicable)
- [ ] No inline styles (unless necessary)
- [ ] Loading states are handled
- [ ] Error states are handled

### Documentation
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated component documentation (if needed)
- [ ] PropTypes or TypeScript types are added (if applicable)

### Git
- [ ] My branch is up-to-date with the `dev` branch
- [ ] Commit messages follow Conventional Commits format
- [ ] No merge conflicts
- [ ] Branch name is descriptive (e.g., `feature/add-search`, `fix/navbar-bug`)
